heading: WELCOME TO GREEN NATION
account_active_message: Your account is now active and ready to use. Starting today, enjoy a banking experience designed for demanding needs and borderless lifestyles.
features_title: Everything you need, in one seamless banking experience
feature_1_description: Send your funds across Europe and internationally, quickly and securely.
feature_2_description: Manage multiple currencies from one seamless space.
feature_3_description: Pay anywhere, online or in-store, and add your cards to Apple Pay or Google Pay.
feature_4_description: Keep a clear overview of your spending with instant notifications.
impact_title: Together, we make your impact grow
impact_description: In addition, depending on your subscription, your activities contribute to the carbon offset of your expenses.
support_description: At Green Nation, every client benefits from personalized support and direct communication with their Account Manager, because we know your needs don't fit the standards.
book_call_label: Book a call with your Account Manager:
signoff:
See you soon,
The Green Nation Team
